description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies the component's template, state, and input handling logic for toggling a favorite state.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the visual structure of the Button component, displaying a Text element that changes content based on the component's state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's reactive state variables: isFavorited, favoriteText, unfavoriteText.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event by toggling the isFavorited state.
